content:
Hi.
When my users copy-paste an image to a stream/pm, they can see the image but the receiving part just sees a text like this:
[Uploading image.jpgâ€¦]()
Any idea why?
@Ricardo Duarte is your Zulip server behind a proxy? I haven't heard of similar reports, so I'd guess this is e.g. your proxy not forwarding uploaded files properly.
